text: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan is an American-Chinese animated children's television series produced by Nickelodeon Animation Studio. It began as a series of three interstitial shorts on Nick Jr. called Downward Doghouse.[2] The first full episode was initially set to premiere on October 22, 2007[3][4] on Nickelodeon's Nick Jr. block in the United States, but was delayed to Novemeber 5, 2007, coinciding with Thankgiving.[3] The Theme song is sung by Jade-Lianna Peters. Category:American animated television series
title: Ni Hao, Kai-Lan
